an6.42:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena icchanangalam nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
an6.42:1.3: Tatra sudam bhagava icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an6.42:1.5: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito icchanangalam anuppatto icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an6.42:1.6: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an6.42:1.7: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno …pe… buddho bhagava’ti.
an6.42:1.8: So imam lokam sadevakam …pe… arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
an6.42:1.9: Atha kho icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika tassa rattiya accayena pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya yena icchanangalavanasando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bahidvarakotthake atthamsu uccasadda mahasadda.
an6.42:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagito bhagavato upatthako hoti.
an6.42:2.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nagitam amantesi:
an6.42:2.3: “ke pana te, nagita, uccasadda mahasadda kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
an6.42:2.4: “Ete, bhante, icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya bahidvarakotthake thita bhagavantamyeva uddissa bhikkhusanghanca”ti.
an6.42:2.5: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an6.42:2.6: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an6.42:2.7: so tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya”ti.
an6.42:3.3: Yena yeneva dani, bhante, bhagava gamissati, tanninnava bhavissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an6.42:3.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaninnam udakani pavattanti;
an6.42:3.5: evamevam kho, bhante, yena yeneva dani bhagava gamissati, tanninnava bhavissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an6.42:4.1: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an6.42:4.2: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an6.42:4.3: so tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya.
an6.42:5.1: Idhaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami gamantaviharim samahitam nisinnam.
an6.42:5.3: ‘idanimam ayasmantam aramiko va upatthahissati samanuddeso va tam tamha samadhimha cavessati’ti.
an6.42:5.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gamantaviharena.
an6.42:6.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne pacalayamanam nisinnam.
an6.42:6.3: ‘idani ayamayasma imam niddakilamatham pativinodetva arannasannamyeva manasi karissati ekattan’ti.
an6.42:6.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an6.42:7.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne asamahitam nisinnam.
an6.42:7.3: ‘idani ayamayasma asamahitam va cittam samadahissati, samahitam va cittam anurakkhissati’ti.
an6.42:7.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an6.42:8.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne samahitam nisinnam.
an6.42:8.3: ‘idani ayamayasma avimuttam va cittam vimocessati, vimuttam va cittam anurakkhissati’ti.
an6.42:8.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an6.42:9.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami gamantaviharim labhim civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
an6.42:9.2: So tam labhasakkarasilokam nikamayamano rincati patisallanam rincati arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani;
an6.42:9.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gamantaviharena.
an6.42:10.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam labhim civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
an6.42:10.2: So tam labhasakkarasilokam patipanametva na rincati patisallanam na rincati arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani.
an6.42:10.3: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an6.42:11.1: Yasmaham, nagita, samaye addhanamaggappatipanno na kanci passami purato va pacchato va, phasu me, nagita, tasmim samaye hoti antamaso uccarapassavakammaya”ti.
